divs: Sighting Detailsabout a month and a half ago i dont know the exact date but it was the samenight that planes flew over pres bushs ranch in crawford my wife was outsidelooking at the stars when she hollard at me to come outside when i got there isaw in the sky a large glowing spheremoving from the southwest to the northeastat a high rate of speed altitude was from 5000 to 10000 ft the craft made nosound and covered the whole horizon in about 1 minute i am a private pilot so iknow planes was no plane last night we seen it again slightly diffrant flightplan same altitude but it came from due south to north east but about half wayacross the horizon it shot strait up towards space and dissapeared last nightsevents were witnessed by 8 adults and 2 children the craft weveseen is aconstant bright glow no flashing beacons are such and no soundmy wife and i sawa news rteport several weeks ago about similar lights being seen in californiaand it showed a vidio and the lights looked exactly like what weve been seeingthey said the only explanation they could come up with was it s theinternational space station well all i can say is if it is than the spacestation is in our atmosphere i will be glad to answer any futher questions onthis subject by phone or email thank you dennis howell
